Diameter.description: Diameter of this planet in kilometers (currently assuming that this planet is perfectly round)

Water.description: What percentage of this planet's surface is water (also determines land surface percentage)

LandColour.description: Hex colour code of this planet's land surface (currently a single flat colour)

WaterColour.description: Hex colour code of this planet's water surface (currently a single flat colour)

Cloudiness.description: What percentage of the planet's surface is covered by clouds

Species.description: List of the species on this planet (currently no other information about them, can be empty)

Gravity.description: Strength of this planet's gravity relative to Earth's (1 = 9.81 m/s)
